title: Patch 5.13 causes problems
body:
I get many short disconnects in my games since the new patch 5.13 came out.

First I thought they would be lags or spikes of my ping but today I started a custom game without any other players and bots and watched at my receiving packets per software while my game was frozen for seconds. I don't get any packets from server. So it's like a very short disconnect, but it doesn't stop and I don't know if I can fix this on my own.
